verses.verse: Now Jericho <S%H3405><s%> was tightly <S%H5462><s%> shut up <S%H5462><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> No one went out, <S%H3318><s%> and no one came in. <S%H935><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Jericho <S%H3405><s%> into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> with its king <S%H4428><s%> and the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

All your men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> shall march around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> going around <S%H5362><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once. <S%H6471><s%> You shall do <S%H6213><s%> this six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams <S%H3104><s%>' horns before <S%H6440><s%> the ark. <S%H727><s%> On the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> you shall march <S%H5437><s%> around the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H7782><s%>

It shall be that when they make a long <S%H4900><s%> blast with the ram <S%H3104><s%>'s horn, <S%H7161><s%> and when you hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall shout <S%H7321><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout; <S%H7321><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall fall down <S%H5307><s%> flat, <S%H8478><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> every man straight before him. <S%H376><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H5375><s%> "Take up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and let seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams <S%H3104><s%>' horns before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

They said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Advance! <S%H5674><s%> March around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and let the armed <S%H2502><s%> men pass on <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s ark. <S%H727><s%>"

It was so, <S%H3091><s%> that when Joshua had spoken <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams <S%H3104><s%>' horns before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> advanced, <S%H5674><s%> and blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets; <S%H7782><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> them. <S%H310><s%>

The armed <S%H2502><s%> men went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them. <S%H622><s%> The trumpets <S%H7782><s%> sounded <S%H8628><s%> as they went. <S%H1980><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not shout, <S%H7321><s%> nor let your voice <S%H6963><s%> be heard, <S%H8085><s%> neither shall any word <S%H1697><s%> proceed <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> I tell <S%H559><s%> you to shout. <S%H7321><s%> Then you shall shout. <S%H7321><s%>"

So he caused the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to go around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> going about <S%H5362><s%> it once. <S%H6471><s%> Then they came <S%H935><s%> into the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and lodged <S%H3885><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams <S%H3104><s%>' horns before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went on <S%H1980><s%> continually, <S%H1980><s%> and blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets: <S%H7782><s%> and the armed men <S%H2502><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them. <S%H622><s%> The rear guard came <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> The trumpets <S%H7782><s%> sounded <S%H8628><s%> as they went. <S%H1980><s%>

The second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they marched around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once, <S%H6471><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> into the camp. <S%H4264><s%> They did <S%H6213><s%> this six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

It happened on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that they rose early <S%H7925><s%> at the dawning <S%H5927><s%> of the day, <S%H7837><s%> and marched around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> in the same way <S%H4941><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times. <S%H6471><s%> Only on this day <S%H3117><s%> they marched around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times. <S%H6471><s%>

It happened at the seventh <S%H7637><s%> time, <S%H6471><s%> when the priests <S%H3548><s%> blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Shout, <S%H7321><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the city! <S%H5892><s%>

The city <S%H5892><s%> shall be devoted, <S%H2764><s%> even it and all that is in it, <S%H3068><s%> to Yahweh. Only Rahab <S%H7343><s%> the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> shall live, <S%H2421><s%> she and all who are with her in the house, <S%H1004><s%> because she hid <S%H2244><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> that we sent. <S%H7971><s%>

But as for you, <S%H7535><s%> only keep <S%H8104><s%> yourselves from the devoted thing, <S%H2764><s%> lest when you have devoted <S%H2763><s%> it, <S%H3947><s%> you take of the devoted thing; <S%H2764><s%> so would you make <S%H7760><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> accursed, <S%H2764><s%> and trouble it. <S%H5916><s%>

But all the silver, <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> and vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron, <S%H1270><s%> are holy <S%H6944><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> They shall come <S%H935><s%> into Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s treasury. <S%H214><s%>"

So the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted, <S%H7321><s%> and the priests blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H7782><s%> It happened, <S%H5971><s%> when the people heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout, <S%H8643><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> fell down flat, <S%H5307><s%> so that the people <S%H5971><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> straight before him, <S%H3920><s%> and they took the city. <S%H5892><s%>

They utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all that was in the city, <S%H5892><s%> both man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> both young <S%H5288><s%> and old, <S%H2205><s%> and ox, <S%H7794><s%> and sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and donkey, <S%H2543><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> who had spied out <S%H7270><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> into the prostitute <S%H2181><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and bring out <S%H3318><s%> from there the woman <S%H802><s%> and all that she has, <S%H7650><s%> as you swore to her."

The young men <S%H5288><s%> who were spies <S%H7270><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and brought out <S%H3318><s%> Rahab <S%H7343><s%> with her father, <S%H1><s%> her mother, <S%H517><s%> her brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all that she had. <S%H3318><s%> They also brought out all her relatives, <S%H4940><s%> and they set <S%H3240><s%> them outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

They burnt <S%H8313><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and all that was in it. <S%H5414><s%> Only they put the silver, <S%H3701><s%> the gold, <S%H2091><s%> and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> and of iron <S%H1270><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>

But Rahab <S%H7343><s%> the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> her father <S%H1><s%>'s household, <S%H1004><s%> and all that she had, <S%H3091><s%> Joshua saved <S%H2421><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%> She lived <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> because she hid <S%H2244><s%> the messengers, <S%H4397><s%> whom Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H7650><s%> them with an oath at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who rises up <S%H6965><s%> and builds <S%H1129><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> With the loss of his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> shall he lay its foundation, <S%H3245><s%> and with the loss of his youngest <S%H6810><s%> son shall he set up <S%H5324><s%> its gates. <S%H1817><s%>"
So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> and his fame <S%H8089><s%> was in all the land. <S%H776><s%>
